short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to automatically trim and delete your browsing history

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🧹 History Trimmer: Automatically Clear Old Browsing History

✨ Keep your Chrome browsing history clean and private with History Trimmer! This lightweight extension automatically removes browsing history older than your chosen time limit, helping you stay organized and secure.

🔥 Key Features:

⏳ Custom Time Limit: Set how long (e.g., 7 days, 30 days, etc.) you want to keep your history.
🤖 Automatic Cleanup: Say goodbye to manual work—history trimming happens effortlessly in the background.
🔒 Privacy-Friendly: All data stays on your device. No history is sent to external servers.
🎛️ User-Friendly Interface: Intuitive settings make it easy to customize the extension just the way you like it.
🚀 Perfect for users who value privacy and want a clutter-free browsing experience!

📥 Download History Trimmer now and take control of your browsing history!
